thread.title: Nice hotels included in your trip
thread.title_full: Nice hotels included in your trip

author: Goviet nam-2015-10-15T06:20:27-0400
title: Nice hotels included in your trip
text:
Travel Articles | October 15, 2015 
Whatever your reason for visiting Can Tho, the Tay Do Hotel is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away. 
Conveniently located in Can Tho, Tay Do Hotel is a great base from which to explore this vibrant city. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. For sightseeing options and local attractions, one need not look far as the hotel enjoys close proximity to Can Tho Old Market, Xom Chai Quay, Ninh Kieu Hospital.At Tay Do Hotel , every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour room service, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking. TVs with cable channels are featured in all 42 rooms, and you can enjoy WiFi, wired Internet, and free bottled water. Minibars provide refreshments, and room service makes dining in an option. Nice touches to enhance your stay include slippers and free toiletries. Additionally, hair dryers, phones, and desks are available. The restaurant, Tay Do, serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Additionally, you'll find free WiFi in public areas and spa services. Free breakfast is available daily between 6 AM and 9 AM. 
Phuong Dong hotel is located at the center of Can Tho city, far away from ninh Kieu Quay – a famous beautiful site all over country – some minutes of walking and at the same time, it is also convenient when you need to go to commecial center, other financial trades in the city. We are ready for receiving businessmen and tourists, rooms are equipped perfectly, with luxurious and modern sitting room will bring you a comfort and safety. The hotel has been recently refurbished and features 24-hour room service, massage services and a beauty centre. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Rooms at Phuong Dong Hotel are well-appointed and have a mini bar, a refrigerator and a private bathroom. All include wireless internet access, a bathtub and tea and coffee making facilities. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. Each evening, guests are invited to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Phuong Dong Hotel is a convenient base to discover the Can Tho Bridge and Cai Be Floating Market, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Can Tho International Airport can be accessed via the hotel's shuttle service in less than 20 minutes. 
Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
